ai.summary: London LOOP (Section 12) is a 10.2 km moderate hike in the UK along the London LOOP. This section blends parkland, riverside trails, and occasional urban stretches, offering a steady pace and light elevation gain suitable for a day walk.
ai.terrain_summary: This section features a mix of paved paths, gravel tracks, and some uneven or grassy sections, with gentle elevation changes and occasional steps or slopes.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for daylight hours and check the forecast. Wear sturdy footwear and bring weather-appropriate clothing. Stay hydrated and carry water and snacks. Be aware of road crossings in urban sections and follow pedestrian signs. Carry a map or GPS, and keep a mobile phone charged; signal can be patchy in some parts. If possible hike with a companion. Pack a lightweight rain jacket, sun protection, a small first aid kit, a whistle, and a compact emergency blanket. Let someone know your route and expected return time.
recommended_gear: Map, GPS device, or reference app
Light rain jacket or wind shell
